title: LOC: Kargil
occurrences: News is that a few rats have crossed over into our territory from the LOC
Not to worry, sir. We'll crush the rats and push them back across the LOC
The Mujahidins and the Pakistani troops have crossed the LOC...
The maximum mobilization must take place in the Kargil sector
And Kargil terrain is such, where the ratio will be 10:1
Sir, let us cross the LOC and cut off the enemy from behind
You are required to proceed to Yaldor Kargil sector immediately
Lalit Rai wants to see you victorious in Kargil!
18 Grenadiers to Kargil Dras sector immediately
move your Battalion 17 Jat to Kargil sector immediately
The Battalion is moving to Mathai. Kargil sector
Kargil? Trouble area?
Things here at Kargil are pretty bad
Now your task, move to Kumri, Kargil sector
Kargil. Dras sector. There's said to be some problem there
Where's the battalion? - My battalion has left for Kargil
for Kargil. l've got to leave too
How did the enemy cross the LOC and get in, in the first place?
There were a few bunkers lying vacant on the LOC
Looks like there's a lot of trouble brewing in the Kargil sector, sir
before coming to Kargil, the C.O told us...
